name: Delete listing by title (Manage my listings)
description: Navigates to the Manage my listings page and deletes a listing whose title matches the provided text, then captures the confirmation banner and remaining listing titles. Precondition: Listing should exist. Can be called from any page. Successful outcome: Deleted listing.

steps.description: Locate the listing with the exact title and trigger its Delete action. If a confirmation prompt appears, confirm it.
steps.task: On the Manage my listings page (could span multiple pages), find the listing whose title matches "{item_title}" and click its Delete/Del action to delete it. Confirm any prompt if shown.
